user.name: Emad
user.description: Open Sovereign AI @ii_posts. Founder @StabilityAI.

fullText:
Best AI alignment papers of 2025?

Share away!

Good writing is usually about more than it seems to be. Robert Morris introduced me to this idea when he pointed out that K&R was not just about C but about how to program. Since then I've noticed example after example of this phenomenon.

If you want to start writing essays but are intimidated by the idea, one possible solution is to write about specialized topics you happen to know a lot about. Then there will be less pressure. And if you're a domain expert, you know you'll be helping your readers.
